about_the_game:
Soul at Stake - "British Beauty" Sophia's Dress

"British Beauty" Sophia's Dress DLC includes Tea Party Lady, Rose Madam, Splendid Lotus, and Silvermoon Heels.
Dressing up carefully is not only a matter of aesthetics, but also etiquette.

Tea Party Lady

This disc-shaped hat brings thoughts of a leisurely afternoon. Small but irreplaceable.

Rose Madam

Gentle and graceful, she has calm eyes. Her birth and beauty often make it difficult to see another side of her.

Splendid Lotus

The elegant dress complements itself with splendid lotus leaves. And the large jewel necklace on the chest makes it impossible to remove the line of sight.

Silvermoon Heels

Without any extra decor, the simplicity of bright and glamorous silver reveals a succinct extravagance.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a chase and slash game mode that uses sharp or blunt weapons, the screen will have a blood splash effect on a successful attack and during the execution event. The setting option "Bloody Mode" is available in the game. Turning off the "Bloody Mode" can remove the blood effects and has a mosaic occlusion when executed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8.1)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 960 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
